about_the_game:
This game is a demo version.

This game is about escaping from a beach that repeats the same place over and over again.

A first-person escape adventure game.

==========================================

Where are we?

What is this beach?

What time is it?

Who am I?

Why did this happen?

==========================================

『Lingkaran』 is a circle that you can't escape from forever.

Trapped on a beach with sandy shores everywhere you go, you'll be searching for a way out.

You are trapped on a beach that goes on and on forever, and you must find a way to escape.

◇About this game

Waking up on a mysterious beach

Players must find items and tricks on the island to find a way to escape and

and why they are trapped on this island.

Examine every single thing on the beach.

Find out as much as you can about what is on the beach.

There may be hints for strategies or contents directly related to the story.

Use items you get.

Items that you have explored and obtained may be used somewhere.

Using them in various places will advance the story somewhere.

Walk and explore anyway.

There is always a solution somewhere.

Even if it is the same scene if it is moving,

If you think and understand what the change means, you can find a solution.

If you think about and understand what that change means

you will get off this island.

And find the truth of the story of how you came to be here.

Find the truth of the story.

※All videos and screenshots are under development.

Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit windows10
  • Processor: intel i5-7500 3.4 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NDIVIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD (Preferred), HDD (Supported)

  • OS: 64-bit windows10
  • Processor: intel i7-9700K 3.6 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NDIVIA GeForce RTX 3060
